title: Minecraft 主机版 TU56/CU47/Patch 1.55/Patch 6/Patch 26 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1345979462 于 2017-7-31 19:39 编辑 
主机版即Xbox 360，Xbox One版，PlayStation 3/4/Vita版，WiiU版，Switch版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。 迎接新的正式版吧！ 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。Change log for Title Update 56 - July 25th 2017Added Canyon, a free Glide track.增加了滑翔游戏的峡谷地图Added Biome Settlers 2 Skin pack.增加生物群系移居者2皮肤包Added Terracotta and Glazed Terracotta layers to Tumble.增加陶瓦和带釉陶瓦层Improved performance in Solo Glide when restarting the level (particularly with split-screen spectators).改善滑翔游戏单挑模式在重启地图的时候（尤其是全屏的观察者）的表现Totem of Undying now also applies Fire Resistance II.不死图腾现在会给予玩家火焰保护IIFixed some areas where it was possible to escape from Battle maps or Glide tracks.修复战斗地图或滑翔翼游戏中一些区域能够让玩家逃离Fixed a bug where players were unable to milk a Cow in Creative Mode.修复玩家在创造模式不能挤牛奶的BugFixed a bug where players were being teleported back to the Nether portal shortly after arriving in the other dimension.修复了在抵达另一世界后玩家会被传送回去的BugFixed a bug where broken Banners wouldn't stack with crafted Banners.修复了破坏掉的旗帜不会和普通的旗帜堆叠的BugFixed a bug where Wheat, Ladders, and Banners were not correctly spawning in Woodland Mansions.修复了林地府邸小麦楼梯和旗帜不会正确生成的BugFixed a bug where Monster Spawners in Woodland Mansions were Pigs instead of Spiders.修复了林地府邸怪物刷怪笼是猪不是蜘蛛的BugFixed a bug where the Item Frame icon appeared when holding a Map.修复在物品展示框持有地图时显示图标的BugFixed an incorrect death message when players were killed by Zombie Villagers.修复当玩家被僵尸村民杀死时死亡消息错误的BugFix for custom names of Mobs not being shown in death messages.修复怪物的自定义名字不在死亡消息中显示的BugFix for being unable to unlock "Sniper Duel".修复不能解锁"Sniper Duel"的BugFix for being unable to unlock "Camouflage".修复不能解锁"Camouflage"的BugFix for MCCE #5183 - Player can kill a tamed Parrot with PvP disabled.玩家在PvP禁用时能杀死驯养的鹦鹉Fix for MCCE #5062 - Farmer Villagers only plant one seed after harvesting a whole crop of seeds from a field.农夫村民在收获作物后只补种一个种子Fix for MCCE #4103 - Time spent on the Pause menu when under water counts towards the "Free Diver" trophy.在水下暂停时的时间也会计算在"Free Diver"成就内Fix for MCCE #3112 - When trying to throw food, Villagers throw it in the wrong direction.当村民尝试扔食物时位置错误Fix for MCCE #5219 - Two types of Bone Block with different pictures.两种不同材质与类型的骨块Fix for MCCE #4989 - Zombie Villager Spawn eggs are the wrong colour.僵尸村民生成蛋颜色错误Fix for MCCE #5261 - Flower hitbox is displaced.花朵没有碰撞箱Fix for MCCE #4897 - Beds explode when TNT Explodes is disabled.TNT爆炸禁用时床也会被炸掉Fix for MCCE #4954 - Mobs can't move with a block above them.怪物在头上有方块时不能移动Fix for MCCE #3010 - Constructing an End portal in a certain method can lead to the End Portal being created next to the portal frame.用某种特殊方法建造末地传送门会让末地传送门在门框旁出现Fix for MCCE #5292 - Only regular Skeletons spawning in the Nether.地狱只生成普通骷髅Fix for MCCE #5151 & MCCE #5208 - Item frames don't show the custom name of their items.物品展示框不展示物品的自定义名字

  外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 Mojang官方博客（英文）4JStudios的Twitter（英文，内地需翻墙）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）官方更新日志（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Console Edition version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细，很慢）

主机资讯——所有主机版正式版、新特性预报、销量等。

主机版即Xbox 360，Xbox One版，PlayStation 3/4/Vita版，WiiU版，Switch版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。
